alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Henry; Patrick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT HENRY...SOUTHERN FRANKLIN AND NORTHEASTERN PATRICK COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF MARTINSVILLE THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairy Stone State Park, or 7 miles west of Bassett, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Martinsville... Spencer... Bassett... Sydnorsville... Axton... Ridgeway... and Snow Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
